text: Ngempela sazithumela izithunywa zethu namavesi acacile futhi sehlisela phansi kanye nabo incwadi kanye nesilinganiso ukuze abantu benze ubulungiswa futhi sehlisela phansi insimbi kuyona kunamandla amakhulu kanye nezinzuzo zabantu futhi ukuze amazi uMvelinqangi lowo omsizayo (ngokumkhonza) nesithunywa sakhe engabonwa, ngempela uMvelinqangi uqatha, uphakeme ngamandla
